Commands.Quick Hit: 3-hit Melee BRV attack  High turn rate
Commands.Slash: 2-hit melee BRV attack  Target: Fair chance 5 turns SPD Down I
Commands.Slash Combo: 2-hit Melee BRV attack + HP attack.  Target: 6 turns SPD Down I, ATK Down I, DEF Down I.  High turn rate.
Commands.Energy Rain: 6-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack  BRV attacks distributed based on number of enemies  Deals total HP damage to each target  Self: 5 turns ATK Up II, SPD Up I

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV
Artifacts.Rapid Speed: Raises Speed by 10% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Artifacts.Mighty Quick Hit: Raises BRV Damage dealt with Quick Hit by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty Slash: Raises BRV Damage dealt with Slash by 10%

Passives.Quick Hit Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Quick Hit.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.First Strike: Moderately raises Attack at the start of each battle.
Passives.Slash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Slash.
Passives.Ability Attack High: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt when using abilities continuously (including enhanced BRV/HP Attack).
Passives.Quick Hit Charge: Increases the max uses of Quick Hit by 1.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Slash Charge: Increases the max uses of Slash by 1.
Passives.Ace Striker: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn when BRV equals 0.
Passives.Speed Buff: Slightly raises SPD with active buffs
Passives.Quick Hit Extension: Quick Hit use +2When using Quick Hit:   Moderate damage boost
Passives.Debuffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Slash Extension: Slash, Slash Combo use +1When using Slash, Slash Combo:   Slight BRV damage boost

Weapons.Astral Sword CP: 15: Increases the potency of Quick Hit.Grants Small Attack Up and Small Speed Up for 3 turns.
Weapons.Brotherhood CP: 35: Turns Slash to Slash Combo (BRV+HP attack) and lowers the Action Delay.Increases the potency of Speed Down, raises its success rate and extends its duration.Inflicts Small Attack Down and Small Defense Down for 6 turns.
Weapons.Force Saber CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Energy Rain.
